Package model.pieces.types

Interface Summary
MovementPattern Defines what movements a piece is allowed to make.
 

Class Summary
BishopPattern Implements the MovementPattern of a standard chess bishop.
JumpingPattern MovementPattern used for pieces that can jump to set offsets without caring what's between where it is and the resulting position.
KnightPattern Implements a standard Chess knight pattern.
LinePattern Defines a general pattern for pieces that move in straight lines.
MultiPattern Creates a MovementPattern from multiple MovementPatterns.
PawnPattern A pattern that allows movement like a regular chess pawn.
QueenPattern Defines the MovementPattern for a standard chess queen.
RookPattern Defines the MovementPattern for a standard chess rook.
SimplifiedKingPattern The simplified chess king movement pattern.
